ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000NLjbE:ref

Hi Santosh,

Before we can proceed further with the case, can you please provide us the following information:
•        What is the impact of the issue on your business?
We disabled DIP option we are not getting any logs.
•        Who is affected by this issue?
All end users DPI disabled
•        What are the steps to reproduce?
If we enable DPI policy, end users will get issue for uploading the files
•        Have you attempted any troubleshooting steps yet? If so, what have you tried?
Yes. Updated server, updated client
•        What are you trying to do or accomplish?

•        When did this issue start?
Long back. For audit purpose we need logs and block policy.

•        Can you please let us know the Client, Server, OS version (if not already known) on which the situation is encountered?
Latest version already mentioned in ticket.
•        Please send us a screenshot of how DPI is configured.

Thanks
Santosh Kaddu
